roleset.name: last longer than

example.name: pretty simple
example.text: Japan's marathon economy, growing at 4.3% this year, is now in its 35th month of expansion, and some economists are betting that the boom will outlast the record 57-month expansion in the late 1960s.
example.arg: the record 57-month expansion in the late 1960s.

roleset.note: OUTLAST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'outlast' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from outlast.01-v predicate notes)
